description:
Communal grounds:
1 x London Plane (T1) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x London Plane (T2) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x London Plane (T3) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x London Plane (T4) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x London Plane (T5) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x Norway Maple (T6) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x Tulip (T7) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
1 x Amelanchier (T8) - Remove dead and/or dying stems.
1 x Ash (T10) - Reduce as per previous practice to clear away from street lamp. Remove deadwood from crown.
1 x Amelanchier (T14) - Young tree maintenance.
1 x Amelanchier (T22) - Young tree maintenance.
1 x Amelanchier (T23) - Fell.
1 x Amelanchier (T28) - Fell.
1 x Amelanchier (T29) - Young tree maintenance.
1 x Liquidambar (T30) - Reduce back to most recent point of reduction.
10 x Birch (G34) - Fell x 3 of the Birch trees
